configuration.sarif-viewer.rootpaths.des: Add root paths for default mapping of locations in the sarif file that can't be found (ex. the local root directory of your repo)

configuration.sarif-viewer.resultsListGr: The column to group the results list by
configuration.sarif-viewer.resultsListSo: The column to sort the results list by(per group) and the order
